Then the equation would look like this: 4 \* 7 + 12 - 2 \* 3

Next, I would do the multiplication, since that comes before addition and subtraction in the order of operations. So I would multiply 4 \* 7 to get 28 and multiply 2 \* 3 to get 6.

Then the equation would look like this: 28 + 12 - 6

Finally, I would do the addition and subtraction from left to right. So I would add 28 + 12 to get 40 and then subtract 6 from 40 to get 34.

The answer is 34.
